definition: any piece of work that is undertaken or attempted, present for consideration, examination, criticism, etc.
details:
noun
- any piece of work that is undertaken or attempted
= synonyms: labor
- a planned undertaking
= synonyms: projection
verb
- present for consideration, examination, criticism, etc.
= synonyms: propose
- regard as objective
= synonyms: externalize, externalise
- communicate vividly
= example: communicate vividly
- transfer (ideas or principles) from one domain into another
- throw, send, or cast forward
= example: throw, send, or cast forward
= synonyms: send off
- put or send forth
= synonyms: throw
- imagine
= synonyms: figure
- make or work out a plan for
= synonyms: design, plan, contrive
- draw a projection of
- project on a screen
= example: project on a screen
- cause to be heard
= example: cause to be heard
- extend out or project in space
= synonyms: jut
